name: Flying Box
text: This place is--was--wonderful. Scratch made pizza and dough on the spot. Pick what you want and load up a card to grab beer straight from the wall of taps. Driving by and seeing their stove being loaded up into a U-haul just made my heart ‚Ä¶More

name: Gloria Dowdy
text: I really enjoyed the pizza! I was very pleased with the taste and the good Customer service. My only concern was that it was a little pricey but I'm sure that I will revisit soon.

name: Bethany Brantley
text: Absolutely love this place since you can choose all your toppings! When we went this time, they had Calipower pizza crust. We decided to give it a try & it tastes just like a thin crust, even better actually! Will definitely order this crust as long as they have it around!

name: Dawn Sigler
text: Pizza was excellent! And Brittany was very helpful. We will definitely be coming back ‚ù§Ô∏è

text: Pizza joint that doesn‚Äôt have cheese and very rude employees. Not worth it with so many other pizza joints. Don‚Äôt waste your time.

name: carolyn johnson
text: We had a family birthday celebration  for my 5 year old granddaughter here.  We loved the freshly prepared  vegan pizzas. They were delicious! I also liked the different flavored drinks  available from the self service drink machine. We will be going back  soon.

name: Mike Brown
text: The food was great. Customer service wasn't too hot and the tables were dirty so it was hard to find a clean table. Manager was not very welcoming.We were the only two dine in  customers there.

name: Nikki Tbo
text: The pizzas are really tasty though it's kind of pricey if you're wanting some beer. The beer quality is perfect! I love the fact that we self serve them, some bartenders specially here in Memphis don't do it correctly.

name: Tammy Barge
text: Went to Wolfchase location at 5pm on a Saturday. Place was almost empty yet service was lousy. Excessive wait time for pizza to be cooked. Server that brought pizza said "If it's too crispy we can make it again". Well, it wasn't just crispy ‚Ä¶More

text: The restaurant is extremely clean. The employees are friendly and helpful. I love the concept, taste of the food and prices.

name: Natalie Franklin
text: Placed a $45 order for family box plus wings. Food delivered cold to include the wings in the little plastic container. I specifically asked for the wing sauce on the side but that didn't happen either. When I called to complain she told me ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza Rev is an ok pizza place.  Their pizza sauce could use some work it tasted very generic.  The are pretty generous with the toppings.

text: Great concept. You build the pizza of your dreams and fill your beer mug with your choice of beer and get to sample what you want to try. I will be back
